page.title: 04 Monmouth Comprehensive
page.content: In 1977 there was a reorganisation of secondary education in the Monmouth area.The Secondary Modern School with 600 pupils was suddenly transformed into a mixed Comprehensive School of 1170 pupils in 1985.Half of the pupils travel to school by bus.Some leave at 8.00a.m. to arrive by the commencement of school at 9.15a.m..School ends at 3.45p.m.. Pupils wear school uniform and are urged to respect the school and all individuals.Reflecting the demands of the new computer/electronic age,the curriculum faces many changes.Even the First Years are introduced to the new Information Technology.In the Third Year pupils opt for external examination courses.New pre-vocational courses include Auto-Engineering,The World of Business,Consumer Services, Leisure Studies and many others.
